game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, fragments of past and future converge to shape the destiny of the land. Players take on the role of the Timekeeper, tasked with repairing the fabric of chronology.
game.beginning: The game opens in a realm where moments from different eras are bleeding into each other, causing chaos and destruction. Ancient civilizations meet futuristic technologies, and mythical creatures roam alongside advanced robots.
game.ending: After navigating through ancient ruins, post-apocalyptic wastelands, and cyberpunk metropolises, the Timekeeper must confront the mastermind behind the temporal anomaly: a rogue scientist who seeks to reshape reality according to their own design.
